definitions.body: :Ex 25:32 side;—[[חַד]] abs. Ez Eze 34:21 Is 60:4, cstr. 2Sa 2:16 +; sf. [[חִדָּהּ]] Ge 6:16 +, etc; for [[חִדָּה]] 1Sa 20:20 rd. [[חַ֫דָּה]] (or [[חִדּׂה]]; cf. Dr, > [[חִ֫דּה]]); pl. [[חִדִּים]] Ju Jdg 2:3, rd. prob. [[חִדֵּידֶם]] as Nu 33:55, Jos 23:13; cstr. [[חִדֵּי]] Ex 26:13, etc.;—side, of man 2Sa 2:16, Nu 33:55 (H) Jos 23:13 (D), Ju Jdg 2:3 (prob. rd. context as Nu 33:55 GFM; Dl:Pr 75 cp. As. ṣaddu, snare, trap); of one lying Ez Eze 4:4, Eze 4:6, Eze 4:9, [[מִצִּדְּ ְאֶל־חִדְֶָּ]] v:Eze 4:8 turn from side to side; children carried ´[[עַל־ח]] (i.e. prob. on hip) Is 60:4, Is 66:12; of cattle Ez Eze 34:12 (in fig.); of things 1Sa 20:20 (cf. Dr), Ge 6:16, Ex 25:32, Ex 25:32, Ex 25:32 = Ex 37:18, Ex 37:18, Ex 37:18, Ex 26:13, Ex 30:4 = Ex 37:27, De 31:26 (all P); [[מִצַּד]] at the side of, c. gen. pers. 1Sa 20:25, Ru 2:14, so [[מִצִּדְְּ]] Ps 91:7; c. gen. loc. Jos 3:16, Jos 12:9, [[מִצַּד הָהָר]] 2Sa 13:34; [[מִצַּד הָהָר מִוֶּה]] 1Sa 23:26 bis on this side of the hill and on that side; c. sf. rei [[מִצִּדּוֹ]] 1Sa 6:8.
